item.title: Lisa add a quote by John Burdett
item.description: "Your fear of letting go prevents you from letting go of your fear of letting go." -- John Burdett

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Shantideva
item.description: "If you can solve your problem, then what is the need of worrying? If you cannot solve it, then what is the use of worrying?" -- Shantideva

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Lisa add a quote by Madeleine L'Engle
item.description: "We do learn and develop when we are exposed to those who are greater than we are. Perhaps this is the chief way we mature." -- Madeleine L'Engle
